snippet: In his final news conference on his last foreign trip as president, he argued for a foreign policy in which America continues to take on major global problems....
abstract: Pres Obama, during trip to Lima, Peru, argues for America's continued leadership in addressing global problems; statement comes at end of global tour spent assuring leaders that President-elect Donald Trump will not abandon their alliances.
lead_paragraph: In his final news conference on his last foreign trip as president, he argued for a foreign policy in which America continues to take on major global problems.

headline.main: As Obama’s Tour Ends, He Says U.S. Involvement Abroad Must Not
headline.print_headline: As Obama’s Tour Ends, He Says U.S. Influence Must Not
